children.label: Hierarchical Density Detection
children.content: Replace simplified depth binning with hierarchical point-cloud density detection for improved surface-touch accuracy and efficiency on >100k particles

position.quote: introduce the hierarchical point cloud density detection logic... replace the current simplified depth binning scheme

children.label: Multi-dimensional Interaction Expansion
children.content: Add multi-touch, custom touch shapes (e.g., irregular Lasso), and hardware haptic feedback to create a closed-loop visual-to-physical feedback system

position.quote: expand the system’s scalability... adding support for multi-touch and custom touch shapes... interface with haptic feedback hardware
